'''Gian''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

This poor, hapless Vailian was part of a doomed VTC expedition  to excavate the Poko Kohara ruins for luminous adra. However, when the team inadvertently woke up the Engwithan sentries, his poor lung capacity came to the fore and he wound up pummeled into the sand.
